channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Belvedere band keeps community in tune with backyard jam sessions
item.description: For five years, eight musicians have turned a Belvedere backyard into a weekly community gathering with rock classics and potluck meals.
item.dc:creator: Travis Woods

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A couple celebrates over 50 years of marriage and shared adventures
item.description: The Sea Ranch couple, married 53 years, reflects on raising three children and now enjoying seven grandchildren during their visit.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: New Business: Tiburon entrepreneur launches low-fee platform for tech-savvy homebuyers
item.description: The platform charges homebuyers 0.75% compared to traditional agent fees of 2.5% to 3%, potentially saving tens of thousands of dollars.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon family reunited with missing dog after standoff; woman arrested
item.description: Police recover pet after owner tracks it with AirTag.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister
